tool_description: Creates comprehensive pricing templates and payment structures for vendor cost submissions in RFP.

pricing_model.description: Primary pricing model: fixed_price, time_and_materials, cost_plus, hybrid, subscription

payment_terms.description: Payment schedule: milestone_based, monthly, quarterly, upon_delivery, net_30

currency.description: Contract currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid pricing model: Use fixed_price, time_and_materials, cost_plus, hybrid, or subscription.
Invalid payment terms: Use milestone_based, monthly, quarterly, upon_delivery, or net_30.
Unsupported currency: Provide a valid ISO currency code.
Incompatible pricing structure: Some combinations of pricing model and payment terms may not be compatible.
usage: Specify pricing_model and payment_terms. Optionally set currency and include_expenses flag. The tool generates standardized pricing submission templates for vendors.

pricing_template.description: Formatted pricing submission template for vendors

pricing_instructions.description: Instructions for vendors on pricing submission

evaluation_formula.description: Formula for evaluating and comparing vendor pricing
